mil7.8.6:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bhojanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.8.6:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṁ maggupatthambhena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbasattānaṁ balaṁ vaḍḍheti;
mil7.8.6:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena puññavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:2.3: Idaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbasattānaṁ abhipatthitaṁ;
mil7.8.6:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokābhipatthitena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:3.3: Idaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
